tips.title: Welcome to UbiHub: a data hub for the travelers of ubiquitination pathways
tips.html: You can quickly get familiar with the main features of the UbiHub by reading these tips. You may try out the features described in the tips. If you close the dialog, you can always get back to it from the Help  main menu item.

tips.title: Search Genes in Families
Visualize family tree in different representations
Zoom, drag and Center the tree
